Title: Prohibits the taking of horseshoe crabs or the eggs of horseshoe crabs from the waters of this state beginning January first, two thousand twenty-five
Summary: Prohibits the taking of horseshoe crabs or the eggs of horseshoe crabs from the waters of this state beginning January first, two thousand twenty-five; permits the department of environmental conservation to authorize certain taking of horseshoe crabs by permit for bona fide educational or scientific purposes.
LawCode: Amd ยง13-0331, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting the taking of horseshoe crabs or the eggs of horseshoe crabs from the waters of this state
